item.title: Welcome to the Migrate and Modernise Scale Accelerator!
item.description: As a Microsoft partner focused on the success of small and mid-market customers in Australia & NZ, weâ€™d like to introduce you to a new program designed to accelerate your business helping customers adopt Microsoft Azure!
